item.rel_title: 2019 Novel Coronavirus can be detected in urine, blood, anal swabs and oropharyngeal swabs samples
item.rel_abs: We tested samples collected from nine patients diagnosed with coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). The virus was found in urine, blood, anal swabs and oropharyngeal swabs. It is the first time for SARS-CoV-2 found in urine, though no urinary irritation was found.
item.rel_authors: Peng, L.; Liu, J.; Xu, W.; Luo, Q.; Deng, K.; Lin, B.; Gao, Z.
